snippet: On the Harvard Crimson website, commenters express a mix of shock and outrage at the arrest of a 20-year-old student, Eldo Kim, in the bomb threats Monday.
abstract: On the Harvard Crimson website, commenters express a mix of shock and outrage at the arrest of a 20-year-old student, Eldo Kim, in the bomb threats Monday.

headline.main: Harvard Student Accused of Bomb Hoax to Avoid Final Exam Appears Before Judge
